Smartphone playback control1: Smartphone playback control1The integrated microphone and multi-function control1button make the the MDR-ZX310AP the perfect companion for your smartphone. Android™users can also enjoy the convenient Smart Key app for added control functionality directly from your smartphone.
Quality Sound: Quality SoundThe large 30mm driver units coupled with ferrite magnets will accurately reproduce a broad, dynamic frequency range. You'll enjoy smooth transitions in treble and mid-range frequencies with powerful bass response.

Swivel Earcups: Swivel EarcupsThe slim, swivel and folding style earcups stow away for compact portability.
Y-Type cord: Y-Type cordThe traditional Y-type cord design helps reduce the chance of tangles while the 4-conductor gold plated, L-shaped plug ensures a good connection.
